## TableConfig.defaultHeight property

If `autoheight` is set to `true`<!-- -->, `defaultHeight` will be ignored. Otherwise, container height will be fixed to `defaultHeight`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultHeight?: number;
```
